data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
In the minute 2, Reims are whistled for offside.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Reims advance rapidly upfield but Karim Abed blows for offside.
Free kick in a good position for Reims!
At Stade Auguste Delaune, Fabio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 6, Reims are coming forward and Arber Zeneli gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Free kick for Nantes in the half of Reims.
In the minute 7, Ghislain Konan (Reims) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Nantes in the half of Reims.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Reims.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nantes.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In the minute 12, Nantes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
In the minute 14, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
Nantes needs to be cautious. Reims have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 16, In Reims Nantes attack through Abdoulaye Toure. The finish is off target, however.
Reims have a goal kick.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Free kick Nantes.
Reims push upfield but Karim Abed quickly pulls them for offside.
Nicolas Pallois heads in to make it 0-1 at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 18, Imran Louza instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Karim Abed signals a Nantes throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 19, Can Nantes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Nantes in Reims.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Reims in the half of Nantes.
Reims drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 21, In Reims, Jean-Charles Castelletto (Nantes) misses the target with a header.
Karim Abed awards Reims a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball goes out of play for a Nantes goal kick.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, Andrei of Nantes gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Ball safe as Nantes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Reims have a goal kick.
Nantes pushes forward through Moses Simon, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 29, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Reims's Moreto Cassama misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, Karim Abed awards Nantes a goal kick.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Reims.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 33, Karim Abed signals a Reims throw-in in Nantes's half.
Corner awarded to Nantes.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 39, Reims to take a throw-in in Nantes territory.
Throw-in Nantes.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nantes's half?
In the minute 40, Free kick Nantes.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valon Berisha for Reims gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 41, Nantes have a goal kick.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Reims have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Reims surge into the attack at Stade Auguste Delaune but Kaj Sierhuis’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Nantes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Nantes in their own half.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Nantes in the half of Reims.
The first-half has ended.
Karim Abed has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Fabio with Dennis Appiah.
Arber Zeneli of Reims gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In Reims, Ludovic Blas of Nantes is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Nantes.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Karim Abed awards Nantes a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Nantes's Randal Kolo Muani is on target but unsuccessful.
Reims have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 57, Arber Zeneli (Reims) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Nantes in their own half.
Moreto Cassama (Reims) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 60, Reims push forward at Stade Auguste Delaune and Boulaye Dia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nantes defence.
Karim Abed signals a Reims throw-in in Nantes's half.
Mathieu Cafaro is replacing Kaj Sierhuis for the home team.
In the minute 62, Reims have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
Reims's Wout Faes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nantes have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Karim Abed signals a free kick to Reims.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Nantes.
In the minute 65, Can Reims capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nantes's half?
In Reims Nantes drive forward through Ludovic Blas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Nantes have been awarded a corner by Karim Abed.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Reims close to the penalty box.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from El Bilal Toure.
That's a fine assist from Mathieu Cafaro.
In the minute 70, Mathieu Cafaro (Reims) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Reims have been awarded a penalty...
Charles Traore (Nantes) has received a yellow card from Karim Abed.
In the minute 72, It's advantage Reims in Reims as Boulaye Dia scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
Marcus Coco is replacing Moses Simon for Nantes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Great finish from Mathieu Cafaro to give Reims a 3-1 lead.
In the minute 74, Arber Zeneli with an assist there.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
David Guion is making the team's second substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Marshall Munetsi replacing El Bilal Toure.
In the minute 77, Throw-in Nantes.
Marshall Munetsi of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! Imran Louza pulls one back for Nantes to make it 3-2.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Nantes at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Randal Kolo Muani with Renaud Emond. This is the fifth substitution made today by Patrick Collot.
The away team have replaced Imran Louza with Pedro Chirivella. This is the third substitution made today by Patrick Collot.
Patrick Collot (Nantes) is making a fourth substitution, with Abdoul Kader Bamba replacing Ludovic Blas.
David Guion is making the team's third substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Xavier Chavalerin replacing Valon Berisha.
David Guion (Reims) is making a fourth substitution, with Moussa Doumbia replacing Arber Zeneli.
In the minute 83, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nantes drive upfield and Abdoul Kader Bamba gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Reims defender.
In the minute 87, Free kick Nantes.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Nantes to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Nantes drives forward and Andrei gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Stade Auguste Delaune the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Karim Abed signals a free kick to Nantes in their own half.
Karim Abed awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nantes's Abdoul Kader Bamba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Reims defender.
Abdoul Kader Bamba for Nantes drives towards goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
